execution_plan.description: Fetch the 20 most recently updated orders from the EU orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT orders.id AS s1__id, orders.customer_id AS s1__customer_id, orders.total_eur AS s1__total_eur, orders.updated_at AS s1__updated_at, orders.coupon_code AS s1__coupon_code FROM orders ORDER BY orders.updated_at DESC LIMIT 20

execution_plan.description: Fetch the 20 most recently updated orders from the US orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT orders.id AS s2__id, orders.customer_id AS s2__customer_id, orders.total_eur AS s2__total_eur, orders.updated_at AS s2__updated_at, orders.coupon_code AS s2__coupon_code FROM orders ORDER BY orders.updated_at DESC LIMIT 20

execution_plan.description: Merge the results from EU and US, sort by updated_at and keep the top 20 across all regions.
execution_plan.query: SELECT t.s3__id AS s3__id, t.s3__customer_id AS s3__customer_id, t.s3__total_eur AS s3__total_eur, t.s3__updated_at AS s3__updated_at, t.s3__coupon_code AS s3__coupon_code FROM (  SELECT UNNEST($step1.s1__id)    AS s3__id, UNNEST($step1.s1__customer_id) AS s3__customer_id, UNNEST($step1.s1__total_eur) AS s3__total_eur, UNNEST($step1.s1__updated_at) AS s3__updated_at, UNNEST($step1.s1__coupon_code) AS s3__coupon_code  UNION ALL  SELECT UNNEST($step2.s2__id)    AS s3__id, UNNEST($step2.s2__customer_id) AS s3__customer_id, UNNEST($step2.s2__total_eur) AS s3__total_eur, UNNEST($step2.s2__updated_at) AS s3__updated_at, UNNEST($step2.s2__coupon_code) AS s3__coupon_code) AS t ORDER BY t.s3__updated_at DESC LIMIT 20
